availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, salesman. Kentucky native. Son of Stephen Swift and Lucia Swift. Salesman in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 146.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Ward 2, Lexington, p. 255.
Find A Grave, "Charles Henry Swift (May 25, 1831-October 9, 1881)," Memorial #60275638, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60275638 (accessed April 12, 2018)
